Instruction: In a bowl, combine flour, baking powder, salt, and pepper; mix well. In another bowl, whisk together eggs and buttermilk until smooth. Add the egg mixture to the flour mixture and stir until just combined. Fold in melted cheese and jalapeï¿½os.
Carefully pipe 2-inch strips of dough into the hot oil, working in batches to avoid crowding the fryer.
In a large bowl, mix together egg yolks, water, sugar, and salt until well combined. Gradually mix in the flour and baking powder to form a batter; the mixture will be thick.

The nutritional value of oil used for frying has been calculated based on a retention value of 10% after cooking. The actual amount may differ based on cooking time and temperature, the density of ingredients, and the specific type of oil used.
